This will be the primary& preferred destination for iconic personalities from the NFL, MLB, Hollywood, the music industry and corporate America! Except Michael Vick will not be there. Bloomberg)-- Andy Coulson resigned as director of communications for U.K. Prime Minister David Cameron , citing "continuing pressures" over allegations of illegal phone tapping while he was editor of the News of the World newspaper. Unfortunately continued coverage of events connected to my old job at the News of the World has made it difficult for me to give the 110 percent needed in this role, Andy Coulson said in an e-mailed statement today.
